text: Thaumatichthys pagidostomus is a species of wolftrap angler in the genus Thaumatichthys. It lives at a depth of about 1,400 meters. == Description == Thaumatichthys pagidostomus has a flattened head and an elongated body. It is 8.5 cm (3.3 in) long. Its esca is in its mouth. == References == # Froese, Rainer; Pauly, Daniel (eds.). "Thaumatichthys pagidostomus". FishBase. April 2012 version. == Other websites == Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Thaumatichthys pagidostomus
